title: BROKE vs PRO Mystery Gaming PC Build!
description: Who can build the best mystery box gaming PC build for BvP? Get a Free 32GB Flash Drive and 32GB Micro SD Card at Micro Center:    Kens setup:  AOC CQ27G2 27" WQHD 144Hz Gaming Monitor:  AMD Ryzen 5 3600:  MSI X570 MPG Gaming Edge WiFi Motherboard:  MSI GeForce GTX 1660 Gaming X Graphics Card:  Crucial 8GB DDR4-2666 PC4-21300 CL19:  Toshiba 1TB 7200RPM SATA Internal Hard Drive:  Corsair RM1000x 80 Plus Gold Modular Power Supply:  NZXT H510:  SteelSeries Apex Pro RGB Mechanical Gaming Keyboard  OmniPoint:  SteelSeries Rival 650 Wireless RGB Gaming Mouse  Black:  SteelSeries Arctis Pro Wireless Gaming Headset  Black:  SteelSeries QcK Prism RGB Gaming Mouse Pad 3XL:    Austins Setup:  AMD Ryzen 9 5900X:  MSI X570 MPG Gaming Edge WiFi Motherboard:  MSI GeForce RTX 3060 Ti Ventus 2X Graphics Card:  Crucial Ballistix MAX RGB 32GB (2 x 16GB) DDR4-4000 PC4-32000 CL18:  Crucial P5 1TB SSD:  Cooler Master Hyper 212 RGB Black Universal CPU Cooler:  PowerSpec 650 Watt 80 Plus Gold ATX Semi-Modular Power Supply:  Fractal Design Meshify C Tinted Tempered Glass Midtower ATX Case  Black:  SteelSeries Arctis 7 Wireless Gaming Headset:  SteelSeries APEX 7 Mechanical Gaming Keyboard QX2 Red Switch  Black:  SteelSeries Aerox 3 Wired Gaming Mouse  Black:   My new podcast @TheBackmarkers!  Our second channel @thisis!  My Twitch channel:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
